suffuse.gun.qbz951.desc:
PLA standard issue rifle specialized for confined areas 
an urban warfare tool
suffuse.gun.qbz951s.desc:
PLA standard issue rifle specialized for confined areas 
equipped with special tactical modifications
suffuse.gun.qbu191.desc:
Current PLA Designated Marksman Rifle 
reportedly very accurate
suffuse.gun.an94.desc:
A 5.45mm assault rifle developed by Izhmash 
two bullets can go through the same hole
suffuse.gun.m200.desc:
It was once joked that buying this gun is as rare as being struck by lightning 
but statistics show that being struck by lightning is far more common than purchasing this gun
suffuse.gun.pkp.desc:
A modern general-purpose machine gun developed by TsNIITochMash 
a classic hard to surpass
suffuse.gun.python.desc:
Colt's .357 double-action revolver 
the Rolls-Royce of revolvers
suffuse.gun.n4.desc:
New standard carbine for DEVGRU 
excellent performance but somewhat pricey
suffuse.gun.tec9.desc: I just pulled the trigger, how did the bullets run out???
suffuse.gun.aks74u.desc:
Short assault rifle introduced to the Soviet army in 1979 
compact and reliable bullet launcher
suffuse.gun.ash12.desc:
A 12.7mm automatic rifle developed by KBP Design Bureau 
whether it's enemies or hostages only one shot is needed
suffuse.gun.dvl10.desc:
A compact silent sniper rifle from the Russian Federation. 
A silent blade made of carbon fiber and titanium alloy.
suffuse.gun.mpdr.desc:
Its futuristic design inspired many sci-fi individual weapons. 
Unfortunately, the original gun never made it past prototyping.
suffuse.gun.svd.desc:
A sniper rifle named after its desinger 
the world`s first rifle specifically made for snipers
suffuse.gun.mas38.desc: Rather a less common french submachinegun idk
suffuse.gun.spas12.desc:
Goes well with Dragon Breath shells
But beware of Raptors` ambush
suffuse.gun.l115a2.desc:
Teammates all wiped out?
Save it for next round
suffuse.gun.qbz191.desc:
Next-gen standard issue weapon for the Peaple`s Liberation Army
Ditched the bullpup configuration of the previous design
suffuse.gun.ags30.desc:
Russian automatic grenade launcher currently in production
and in service with the Russian armed forces.
suffuse.gun.rpd.desc: what will happen when you make an ak bigger?
suffuse.gun.ar57.desc: Draw a doge face on your opponent`s body armor
suffuse.gun.fm9.desc:
Prototype compact submachinegun chambered in 9mm
Produced by Magpul only as a proof of concept.
suffuse.gun.rm277.desc:
A bullpup-configured rifle developed by General Dynamics for its bid in the NGSW program
featuring innovative polymer-cased ammunition,
though ultimately losing out to SIG Sauer's submission with many holes.
suffuse.gun.lifecard.desc:
Life`s final insurance 
though you may only get the chance for once
suffuse.block.workbench.desc:
Modular workstation for fabricating weapons
from pistols to heavy ordnances.
what could possibly mean for the strange blueprint and
the mysterious cylinder?
suffuse.attachment.pistollaser.desc: Universal Grip attachment for all weapons.
suffuse.attachment.m7_silencer.desc: Dedicated Suppressor for use with SIG XM7
suffuse.attachment.rm277_silencer.desc: Dedicated suppressor for use with RM277.
